body.p:
Hd Qrs 1st Ky Cav
Camp Nelson Ky
December 30" 1864
Gov. T. E. Bramlette

Sir -- We have the honor to recommend to you George Ames for Commission as 1st Lieut" in Battallion 1st Ky Cav Recruits, we make this Recommendation for the good of the service, based upon one enclosed by Captain Kenney the mustering officer at this place. over Two hundred & fifty Recruits have been held, the undersigned are the Three Captains retained Six Lieut have been retained also, but Capt Kenney has Consented to muster out one of them, who is desirous of leaving the service, and recommend "George Ames" who is eminently qualified to act as Quarter Master for the Battalion or in any other position: We Resptly ask your Consideration, and if possible have him Commissioned,

Very Resptly
Your obt Servts
Philip Robersts Capt
John T. McLain (Capt)
Joe. D. Beatie Capt,

1st
Hd. qrs. 1s Ky Cavy.
Camp Nelson Ky
Dec 30" 1864
Recomend George Ames for a commission as 1" Lt in the Batt. of recruits of 1s Ky Cav.
Recd A. G. O. Ky 21 Jany 1865
